name: The Misadventures of Tron Bonne
description:
In debt to Mr. Loath for one million zenny, Tron Bonne is going to have to rob banks and explore ruins to pay off her debt and rescue her family.
This title is compatible with the PSP™, PS Vita, PS TV and PS3® systems.
Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense).  Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.sonyenteretainmentnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 2 PlayStation® 3 systems and 3 portable PlayStation® systems activated by this account.
